title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 1
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 1
description:
It's time to lock in our top plays of Week 1, and Chad Millman and Simon Hunter of Action Network are ready to roll. Together they build their Faves Five card, along with a Big Balls Bet of the Week, underdog moneyline round robin, and so much more. Is now the time to back Mike Tomlin? How bad are the Jets? All these questions answered, and so much more. #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
